GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop: Iworkin a bank in the city with my friends Anna and Jane. Westart work at 9.00 in the morning and wefinishat 4.30 in the afternoon. I doa lot of different things: I answerthe phones, I talkto our clients and I helpin the office. Anna and I havelunch at 1.00. We eata sandwich at our desks and wedrinka coffee. Jane and I takethe bus home together after work. It's a good job and we all have fun.
